pool.title: MAT Pool Courses
pool.line1: General announcements regarding MAT Pool courses (MAT 103/E, 104/E) are made through this site. The instructor of the course you are enrolled in may also use Moodle or Ninova.
pool.line2: MAT 201/E, 202/E, 210/E, 261/E, 271/E, 281/E courses are not offered by the Mathematics Department. Questions or requests regarding these courses should be directed to the department that offers the course.
